abstract: The Far Eastern Economic Review, an English-language news magazine in print since 1946, will close in December after losing readership and advertising revenue.
snippet: The Far Eastern Economic Review, an English-language news magazine in print since 1946, will close in December after losing readership and advertising revenue.
lead_paragraph: The Far Eastern Economic Review, an English-language news magazine in print since 1946, will close in December after losing readership and advertising revenue, its publisher, Dow Jones & Company, said.

headline.main: Dow Jones to Close Far Eastern Economic Review
headline.print_headline: Dow Jones to Close Far Eastern Economic Review
